column4: Wife}}</ref> Queen to [[Tar-Meneldur]], the fifth King of [[Númenor]], and mother to [[Tar-Aldarion]], the sixth King, and to [[Ailinel]] and [[Almiel]].  She was said to possess great beauty.<ref>{{UT

column1: Almarian's name appears to mean "maiden garlanded with good fortune" in [[Quenya]] (from ''[[alma]]'', 'riches; good fortune' and ''[[rian]]'', 'garlanded maiden').
